scripts.clean: npm run stop; npm run sstop;docker stop $(docker ps -a -q) ; docker rm -v $(docker ps -a -q) ; docker rmi -f $(docker images -q)
scripts.stack-deploy: docker stack deploy -c docker-stack.yml bloop_stack && sleep 10 && docker service ls
scripts.stack-rm: docker stack rm bloop_stack && docker service ls
scripts.sstop: docker service ls && docker service rm $(docker service ls -q)
scripts.registry: docker stack deploy -c docker-registry-stack.yml localrepo && sleep 10 && npm run sls
scripts.registry-rm: docker stack rm localrepo && npm run sls
scripts.push-all: npm run push-nginx && npm run push-express && npm run push-redis
scripts.do-all: npm run clean; npm run build && npm run registry && npm run push-all && npm run stack-deploy
scripts.reload: npm run stack-rm && sleep 10 && npm run stack-deploy
